movies.title: Ödipussi
movies.plot: Gray-haired furniture retailer Paul Winkelmann still has his dinner cooked and his laundry done by his mother. He spends his evenings playing Scrabble with Mama's friends and discussing the role of women in society in his carnival club. When he meets psychologist Margarete Tietze, "Pussi" finally begins to rebel against his dominant mother.
movies.simplePlot: Gray-haired furniture retailer Paul Winkelmann still has his dinner cooked and his laundry done by his mother. He spends his evenings playing Scrabble with Mama's friends and discussing the...

biography.bio: Loriot was once best known as a cartoonist, with the distinguishing feature that all his characters had potato-shaped noses. In the 1960s, he presented the TV series "Cartoon" which featured short animated cartoons from all over the world. In between the clips he acted in little funny sketches. These sketches were by a long way the funniest thing on German television and so Loriot was given his own TV show, only with sketches and no cartoons (except the odd one made by himself). This show turned out to be hugely successful and he was finally persuaded to lift this format to the feature film with Ödipussi (1988).
biography.name: Vicco von Bülow

biography.bio: Katharina Brauren was born on April 21, 1910 in Grabow, Germany. She was an actress, known for Ödipussi (1988), Vera Wesskamp (1992) and Fremde, liebe Fremde (1991). She was married to Konrad Mayerhoff. She died on December 25, 1998 in Hamburg, Germany.
biography.name: Katharina Brauren

biography.bio: Evelyn Hamann was born on August 6, 1942 in Hamburg, Germany. She was an actress, known for Adelheid und ihre Mörder (1993), Attention, papa arrive! (1991) and The Black Forest Clinic (1985). She was married to Hans Walter Braun. She died on October 29, 2007 in Hamburg.
biography.name: Evelyn Hamann

biography.bio: Edda Seippel was born on December 19, 1919 in Brunswick, Germany as Edda Seippel-Forschbach. She was an actress, known for La marquise d'O... (1976), Ödipussi (1988) and Jauche und Levkojen (1978). She was married to Gerhard Forschbach. She died on May 12, 1993 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Edda Seippel

biography.bio: Richard Lauffen was born on June 2, 1907 in Mönchengladbach, Germany. He was an actor, known for Ödipussi (1988), Drei Frauen im Haus (1968) and Timm Thaler (1979). He was married to Elisabeth Wiedemann. He died on August 27, 1990 in Marquartstein, Bavaria, West Germany.
biography.name: Richard Lauffen

biography.bio: Klaus Schultz was born on May 20, 1947 in Bad Kissingen, Bavaria, Germany. He was an actor, known for Ödipussi (1988) and Harlequin (1980). He died on April 26, 2014 in Munich, Bavaria.
biography.name: Klaus Schultz

biography.bio: Walter Hoor was born on December 12, 1924 in Düsseldorf, Germany. He was an actor, known for Ödipussi (1988), Schicken Sie mir einen Dollar! (1965) and Der müde Theodor (1979). He died on January 22, 2016 in Düsseldorf, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany.
biography.name: Walter Hoor

biography.bio: Rosemarie Fendel was born on April 25, 1927 in Koblenz-Metternich, Germany. She was an actress and writer, known for Der Nachtkurier meldet... (1964), Trotta (1971) and Ödipussi (1988). She was married to Hans von Borsody and Johannes Schaaf. She died on March 13, 2013 in Frankfurt am Main, Hesse, Germany.
biography.name: Rosemarie Fendel

biography.placeOfBirth: Perwissau, East Prussia, Germany [now Rozhkovo, Kaliningrad Oblast, Russia]
biography.bio: Heinz Meier was born on February 17, 1930 in Perwissau, East Prussia, Germany. He was an actor, known for Ödipussi (1988), Seraphine oder Die wundersame Geschichte der Tante Flora (1965) and Die Klasse (1968). He was married to Gisela Bonsels and Gisela Meier-Bonsels. He died on July 21, 2013 in Schliengen, Baden-Württemberg, Germany.
biography.name: Heinz Meier

biography.bio: Hans-Günter Martens was born on May 12, 1930 in Hamburg, Germany. He was an actor, known for Attention, papa arrive! (1991), Ödipussi (1988) and Kehraus (1983). He was married to Ilse Ruesch. He died on January 1, 2001 in Hamburg.
biography.name: Hans-Günter Martens

biography.bio: Erich Schwarz was born in 1938. He was an actor, known for Europa Europa (1990), Ödipussi (1988) and Attention, papa arrive! (1991). He died on December 4, 2014.
biography.name: Erich Schwarz

biography.bio: Udo Thomer was born on October 3, 1945 in Regensburg, Germany. He was an actor, known for Der Bulle von Tölz (1996), The Nasty Girl (1990) and Ödipussi (1988). He was married to Edeltraud Thomer. He died on January 12, 2006 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Udo Thomer

biography.bio: Joerg Adae was born in 1943 in Stuttgart, Germany. He is an actor, known for Ödipussi (1988), Ein Geschenk des Himmels (2005) and Verfehlung (2015).
biography.name: Joerg Adae

biography.placeOfBirth: Liegnitz, Silesia, Germany [now Legnica, Dolnoslaskie, Poland]
biography.bio: Eberhard Fechner was born on October 21, 1926 in Liegnitz, Silesia, Germany. He was an actor and director, known for Nachrede auf Klara Heydebreck (1969), Comedian Harmonists (1977) and Damenquartett (1969). He was married to Jannet Gefken, Ingrid Fechner and Margot Krell. He died on August 7, 1992 in Hamburg, Germany.
biography.name: Eberhard Fechner

biography.bio: Dagmar Biener was born and raised in Berlin. At the age of three she appeared in the movie 'Stips' as daughter of Gustav Fröhlich. Joining children's ballet at the Friedrichstadtpalast she began a substantial ballet training at early age. Her later drama school teacher was Else Bongers in Berlin. Dagmar made her debut on stage in 1968 at the Renaissance-Theater, Berlin. Ever since she is regularly present on a variety of Berlin stages. Since 1969 Dagmar Biener has participated in many TV and movie productions. One of her first projects was the film adaptation of the Ulrike Meinhof's play 'Bambule', directed by Eberhard von Itzenplitz. Later she appeared in Loriot successful movies 'Ödipussi' and 'Pappa Ante Portas'. In 1999 she shot 'Club der Millionäre' with Thorsten Näter and appeared as Erna Goltz in Nathalie Steinbart's movie 'Endstation Tanke' in the year 2000. After being featured in Dominik Graf's 'Hotte im Paradies' she now frequently performs in TV series like 'Soko Leipzig', 'Soko Wismar' and 'Sabine' .
biography.name: Dagmar Biener

laboratory: Bavaria Kopierwerk GmbH, München, West Germany

filmingLocations.location: Bavaria Studios, Bavariafilmplatz 7, Geiselgasteig, Grünwald, Bavaria, Germany

categories.category: Best Single Artistic Achievement (Preis für die künstlerische Leistung in einer Komödie)
Best Performance in a Comedy (Beste darstellerische Leistung - Komödie)
